mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER (id, password, name) VALUES (#{id}, password(#{password}), #{name})
mapper.select: SELECT name FROM USER WHERE id = #{id} AND password = password(#{password})
SELECT userId, name, id FROM USER WHERE id = #{id} AND password = password(#{password})
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USER WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT userId, name, id, sessionKey, sessionLimit FROM USER WHERE sessionKey = '${value}' AND sessionLimit > 'now()'
